channel.title: Applications on Haltian Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Applications on Haltian Developer Documentation

item.title: Thingsee Toolbox
item.description:
Thingsee Toolbox is the primary application for deploying and managing Haltian Thingsee IoT installations. With Thingsee Toolbox you can add stacks, manage deployment groups, replace devices, and export CSV files for comprehensive IoT management.

Download

  • App Store (iOS)
  • Google Play (Android)

Requirements: iOS 12+ or Android 10+

Key Features

Feature Description
Stack management Add and manage device databases
Deployment groups Organize devices into logical groups
Device configuration Configure PRESENCE, ENVIRONMENT, COUNT sensors
Logging Track all installation and maintenance actions
CSV export Generate installation documentation

Getting Started

Prerequisites

  1. Download Thingsee Toolbox from App Store or Google Play
  2. Have your stack QR codes ready
  3. Grant camera and storage permissions

Adding a Stack

A stack is a database where your devices are stored.

item.title: Thingsee Toolbox Lite
item.description:
Thingsee Toolbox Lite is a streamlined mobile application for installation and maintenance purposes. It provides essential functionality for managing Thingsee IoT devices with a simplified interface.

Download

  • App Store (iOS)
  • Google Play (Android)

Requirements: iOS 12+ or Android 10+

Internet Required

The application requires an internet connection to work correctly.

Key Differences from Toolbox

Feature Toolbox Toolbox Lite
Stack management Full Basic
Sessions Unlimited One active at a time
Session duration Unlimited 20 hours
Logging Persistent Session-based
Device configuration All types Selected types

Getting Started

Prerequisites

  1. Download Thingsee Toolbox Lite
  2. Have your stack QR codes ready
  3. Grant camera and storage permissions

Adding a Stack

  1. Tap Add Stack
  2. Scan QR codes in order
  3. Press Save after stack information appears

Removing a Stack

  1. Open menu (top right corner)
  2. Select Remove
  3. Confirm or cancel

Sessions

Sessions are time-limited work periods for installations or maintenance.

item.title: Thingsee Entry
item.description:
Thingsee Entry provides a simple, fast way to access sensor data without setting up a dedicated cloud or application environment. The app has everything needed for basic use of Thingsee sensors.

Download

  • App Store (iOS)
  • Google Play (Android)

Requirements: iOS 11+ or Android 10+

Features

Feature Description
Add sensors Scan QR codes to add devices
View data See current and historical values
Alerts Push notifications for thresholds
Share Share sensors with other users
Export Download data as CSV

Thingsee Entry supports both light and dark themes.

item.title: Device Pilot
item.description:
Device Pilot provides powerful analytics and dashboard capabilities for managing Thingsee IoT deployments at scale.

Overview

DevicePilot is a third-party platform that integrates with Thingsee IoT to provide:

  • Data visualization - Charts and graphs for any Thingsee message property
  • Fleet statistics - Device pool analytics and diagnostics
  • Alerting - Automated notifications based on conditions
  • Reporting - Scheduled reports and exports

Integration Setup

To integrate Thingsee with DevicePilot:

  1. Create a DevicePilot account at devicepilot.com
  2. Obtain your DevicePilot API token (see DevicePilot Help)
  3. Contact Haltian to configure data routing to DevicePilot

Data Format

When Thingsee messages are sent to DevicePilot:
